title: Drawing, "George and Eleanor C. Hutton Rand Apartment: Lighting Specifications", ca. 1933–34
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: Scale 3"-1'0"; lower right: Beaux Art Ltg. Co.; center left: Kitchens; center right: toilet; below left: Aisle light; below right: Closet
description: Drawing of various lighting fixtures for the Hutton Rand apartment. Upper left is lighting for kitchen, with upside down bowl affixed to metal (?) base on ceiling. Upper right is lighting fixture for the bathroom, showing decorative edged plate affixed to wall, with cup-shaped bowl attached to plate, similar to colonial style lighting. Aisle lighting at lower left is a plate with four vented openings, to produce non-direct lighting. Closet lighting is a circular bulb attached to ceiling with a short cord to turn light on and off.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "George and Eleanor C. Hutton Rand Apartment: Lighting Specifications", ca. 1933–34.
ca. 1933–34. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-495.
